title: Supreme court allows Texas to use new congressional map favoring Republicans in 2026 elections – US politics live
summary: The Supreme Court ruled in favor of Texas Republicans, affirming their redistricting map that critics argue dilutes the voting power of minority groups. The decision is seen as a significant victory for the GOP in shaping electoral boundaries. The ruling may have implications for future redistricting efforts across the country.

title: Several people arrested in New Orleans amid ICE ‘siege’: ‘It’s racial profiling’
summary: Communities are on edge as the Trump administration continues its crackdown on a second Democratic-led city, now entering its second day. Residents express fear and uncertainty about the implications of this aggressive enforcement. The situation underscores ongoing tensions between federal authorities and local governments with differing political ideologies.

title: Manchester United 1-1 West Ham: Premier League – as it happened
summary: Ruben Amorim's team initially took the lead with a rare goal from Diogo Dalot. However, West Ham equalized, securing a valuable point thanks to Soungoutou Magassa. Scott Murray provides the reactions to the match.

title: Families to be offered help to leave temporary accommodation under UK child poverty strategy
summary: The government has announced a series of initiatives, including enhanced childcare support, aimed at reducing poverty levels. These measures are expected to help lift 500,000 individuals out of poverty. The initiative underscores the government's commitment to improving living standards and social welfare.
